questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) City architecture and buildings
D) Wildlife and animals

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Modern buildings
C) A lake
D) A forest

What type of architecture is prominently featured in the photo?
A) Modern
B) Gothic
C) Classical
D) Futuristic

What appears on the right side of the photo?
A) A river
B) A sign for "Hadson Realty"
C) A tree
D) A car

What does the sign on the right side of the photo advertise?
A) A restaurant
B) A park
C) Real estate services
D) A clothing store

What is the condition of the sign on the right side of the photo?
A) Brand new
B) Slightly faded
C) Completely unreadable
D) Neon-lit

What is the architectural style of the building in the center?
A) Modern
B) Baroque
C) Classical
D) Art Deco

What is the purpose of the Hadson Realty sign?
A) To advertise food
B) To promote real estate services
C) To announce a festival
D) To display artwork

What is the texture of the building in the foreground?
A) Smooth
B) Rough and ornate
C) Glossy
D) Metallic

What is the primary color of the historical building in the center?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Beige/Gray
D) Green

What is the likely function of the building with the sign on the right?
A) Residential
B) Educational
C) Commercial
D) Industrial

What is the condition of the historical building in the center?
A) Newly built
B) Well-preserved
C) Dilapidated
D) Under construction

What is the height of the historical building in comparison to the surrounding buildings?
A) Shorter
B) Taller
C) The same height
D) It is not clear

What is the primary purpose of the building with the sign?
A) Residential apartments
B) Office spaces and realty services
C) Retail stores
D) Entertainment venues
